name: WooCommerce EnvioSimple Integration
author: EnvioSimple

sections.description:
Enviosimple allows you to send a parcel in just a couple of clicks. Connect all your shops, edit your orders and find the best suppliers at the best price.

  • Connect your shops
    Connect your shops in a couple of clicks so that your orders load onto Enviosimple.com automatically.

  • Fully integrated
    You will be able to view and edit your orders from your customer area before shipping.

  • Plug and play
    Connect all your shops in a few steps easily and forget loading orders manually. Straight forward connection, no professional knowledge required.

  • Best suppliers
    We work with the best suppliers both for domestic shipments and international shipments so that you can ship the simplest way at the best price. Envialia, Correos, Correosexpress, MRW, Seur, UPS, FEDEX, etc…

  • No additional costs
    Free App, no subscriptions, no minimum shipments, no maximum shipments, no monthly fees.

  • Further discounts
    Large volume discounts will apply automatically based on your shipments. Load your prepay account with at least 100EUR and get a 5EUR discount coupon for each 100EUR you load and send at an even better price. Have many shipments? Please contact us for a custom tariff.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/enviosimple directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Enviosimple screen to enable the plugin
  4. Agree to all three terms and conditions in order to enable the plugin and click ‘Start Integration’
  5. You will be redirected to enviosimple.com to sign up / log in to your Enviosimple account.

  6. Complete your setup by:

    • Setting up a Packing List Template: These are standard templates Enviosimple will use to ship your incoming orders.
    • Setting up a Default Pickup Address: This is the address where shipments will be picked up by your preferred Shipping Provider.
    • Choosing your Preferred Services: These are preferred Shipping Services that will be used by default. If none chosen, Enviosimple will automatically default to the cheapest provider.

  7. New orders on your WooCommerce store will be displayed on the “External Orders” section of your Enviosimple dashboard.

    • You may leave the default shipping service or select from additional services for your ‘Ready to Ship’ orders.
    • Review your order information and confirm your selection.
    • See all order details, download and print your shipping label from the “Shipments” section of your Enviosimple dashboard.

  8. All set! You can now ship your orders with the best suppliers at the best price.
sections.faq: For answers to frequently asked questions, visit our FAQs page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added advanced cleanup functionality upon deletion of extension

1.0.3

  • Fix webhook loading query

1.0.2

  • Fix the cleanup of the webhook URLs

1.0.1

  • Fix the case when API credentials already exists for a specific instance id

1.0.0

  • Stable version release
  • Providing Terms and Conditions

0.3.0

  • Revoke access handler
  • Removing integration related webhooks

0.2.0

  • Branding ability
  • Plugin adaption for branding ability
  • Small fix for check if WooCommerce is already installed
  • Sending module and module versions to sign up service

0.1.0

  • First version of the plugin
